There is no national security reason to detain migrant children. They do not belong on military bases. They are not prisoners of war. They do not belong in tents. They do not belong in cages. They belong in the arms of their loved ones. #NDAA #nobabyjails #FamiliesBelongTogether

I’m heading down to the House floor to offer an amendment to the National Defense Authorization Act which would prevent @DeptofDefense facilities from being used to detain unaccompanied migrant children.
